guidedtour-desc: Allows pages to provide a popup guided tour to assist new users
guidedtour-tour-test-test-description: This is a test of the description. Lorem ipsum dolor sit!
guidedtour-tour-test-wikitext-descriptio: A guider in your on-wiki tour can contain wikitext. Use it to create a wikilink to the [[{{MediaWiki:Guidedtour-help-url}}|Guided tours documentation]]. Or an [https://example.com external link], for instance.
guidedtour-tour-test-launch-tour-descrip: Guiders can launch other guided tours. Pretty cool, huh?
guidedtour-tour-firstedit-edit-page-desc: {{GENDER:|Click}} the "$1" button to make your changes.
guidedtour-tour-firstedit-edit-section-d: There are "{{int:editsection}}" links for each major section in a page, so you can focus on just that part.
guidedtour-tour-firstedit-preview-descri: Clicking "{{int:showpreview}}" allows you to check what the page will look like with your changes. Just don't forget to save!
guidedtour-tour-firstedit-save-descripti: When you're ready, clicking "{{int:publishchanges}}" will make your changes visible for everyone.
guidedtour-tour-firsteditve-edit-page-de: {{GENDER:|Click}} the "$1" button to make your changes.
guidedtour-tour-firsteditve-edit-section: There are "$1" links for each major section in a page, so you can focus on just that part.
guidedtour-tour-firsteditve-save-descrip: When you're ready, clicking "{{int:publishchanges}}" will make your changes visible for everyone.
